attributes.additional_details:
On behalf of the Stonehenge festival campaign.
Sheweth that for 30 years there has been no Stonehenge free festival with live amplified music, dancing and camping and I fear that what I perceive as a valuable part of my history and culture will be lost.
Wherefore your petitioner prays that your honourable house permits the Stonehenge festival campaign to hold a free festival as part of the summer solstice celebrations on Friday 20 June 2014 and 21 June 2014 with live amplified music, dancing and camping at Barton Stacey army camp and that the mod should provide drinking water, sanitation and welfare for all attendees as part of a coordinated training exercise,
